br.uff.midiacom.ana
Class NCLHead<IB extends NCLImportedDocumentBase,RLB extends NCLRuleBase,TB extends NCLTransitionBase,RB extends NCLRegionBase,DB extends NCLDescriptorBase,CB extends NCLConnectorBase,M extends NCLMeta,MT extends NCLMetadata>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLHead<IB,RLB,TB,RB,DB,CB,M,MT>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLHead<IB extends NCLImportedDocumentBase,RLB extends NCLRuleBase,TB extends NCLTransitionBase,RB extends NCLRegionBase,DB extends NCLDescriptorBase,CB extends NCLConnectorBase,M extends NCLMeta,MT extends NCLMetadata>
extends NCLElement

Esta classe define o elemento head da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define o cabeçalho de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
